stories.title: Compact Wide-Angle Metalens Camera Eliminates Bulky Glass Optics
Code is LOL: Cryptocurrency is asbestos

stories.text:
GitHub became de-facto open source community and version control for software code.

What similar platforms have or are likely to become similar to GitHub, but tailored for deep learning, AI & robotics?

To start the conversation: ROS/ROS2, HuggingFace Transformers, Docker

Also we can cover frameworks with easy-to-share models like PyTorch, TensorFlow, JAX
stories.title: Ask HN: Code / Model Sharing Platforms for Robotics, AI and Deep Learning

stories.text:
2022 US Senate Progressive Democrat for Washington State (Ravin Pierre) candidate running on a platform that includes “Radical Transparency” wants to make lobbyists’ lives miserable. If elected he proposes to livestream /record all interactions with lobbyists on OnlyFans and requiring himself & his Senate staffers to wear bodycams. Candidate Ravin Pierre is an Aerospace Engineer & Data Scientist.

https://mobile.twitter.com/majorityfm/status/1515356488491061258 - short clip: (00:10 mins)

Full video: Radical Transparency (01:46 mins) https://vm.tiktok.com/TTPdkPaXHk/
stories.title: Radical Transparency: If cops have to wear bodycams, so should politicians!
